And you, Mr. President, I hope you like being hit in the face with a gun!,Just launch the missiles!,DIIIIEEEE!!!!

name: Nazi
line: Now that I possess the mighty staff of Rah-gubaba, the world will tremble before the Fourth Reich!,I'm comfortable being called a Nazi. You think there's some other word that will hurt my feelings?  Yeah. Think before you talk shit. Rah-gubaba, help me kill America!

name: Needful
line: I’ve just recently opened for business, Mr, um, Goldenfold.,I also know you long for female company.,This aftershave makes a man quite irresistible to women. Free of charge: one never pays here. Not with money.,Tell me Rick, what do you desire?,What? Sorry?,Ahah. Then perhaps you could make use of this.  This microscope reveals things beyond comprehension. Hahahaha.,A price for everything, Mr. Goldenfold. A price… for everything! Muahahahaha!,You didn’t use it?,Be quiet!,I find this all quite preposterous!,Do I need to call the police?,It’s fine. Summer, you know your grandfather’s right. This store curses people. That’s my business.,Please, call me the devil.,Yes, perhaps not during business hours.,If it’s athletic prowess you desire, principal Vagina, I might-,But I haven’t even-,Huh. Okay. I must say, Summer, I thought your grandfather’s outburst would have disrupted business, but this is the best weekend I’ve had since Salem!,Is that the vegan place?,I’m kind of souped out.,Mrs. Tate, is it? What do you desire?,Whoa, whoa, slow down, honey!, That was perfect.,Um, I… well-,But Mrs. Tate! Why do you want cursed items?,What?,First… and…,Diabolical son of a mother-, Ugh, Jesus. What a waste of a monkey paw.,I’m the devil. What should I do when I fail, give myself an ice-cream?,People like Rick are making me obsolete. I mean seriously, I may be the devil but your grandpa is the devil! I just want to go back to hell where everybody thinks I’m smart and funny.,Okay, I’ll give you one thing. Name it.,Clever twist.,It’s been a long six hours, but we’ve overhauled Needful Things into the globally compliant, web 4.0 e-nomenon, n33dful.com! Spelled with 3s instead of Es.,Okay, that’s it! We just got bought by Google!,Haha. ‘We.’  This is my business! Security!,I was Zuckerberging people before Zuckerberg’s balls dropped. I’m the devil, beeyotch! What what!,And that’s how I took my storefront into the forefront of the upfront! Thank you Seattle!,Rick? Summer?,Ugh… Why?

name: New Meeseeks
line: I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me!,Hisssss!

name: New Yorker
line: Hey, let the trunk people have sex and get married, huh?

name: News Anchor
line: Breaking News: Academy Award-winning actor Jerry Smith is leading police on a slow-speed pursuit after suffering an apparent breakdown.

name: Nicky
line: Somebody call for repairs?,It's me, Cousin Nicky. I'm walkin' here! I mean, I'm not. I'm crouched in the elevator shaft, but hey, I'm walkin' here! ,It's true. We really do get into some crazy situations as a family, mostly when we're cooped up like this. Hey, maybe Mr. Poopypants is right. L-let's get some fresh air.,I hear you, Morty. Back in Brooklyn, we got a sayin' -- "we're walkin' here!" ,Oh!  ,Hey, we got a word for Nazis back in Brooklyn, pal.

name: Off screen student
line: Awesome, Morty!

name: Off screen student 2
line: Oh yeah!

name: Officer
line: Well… He’d probably like to have me to himself, that’s how friends are., My life is a fucking joke.

name: Old man
line: Slow down!,Slow down!

name: Orange Afro Morty
line: Doesn’t that still mean, like, death?

name: Orange Afro Rick
line: Don’t worry, Morty. We still got a way out they never thought of. Operation Phoenix.,Sure, but the joke’s on them cuz we just found a backdoor to getting off this rock.

name: Other Decoy Jerry
line: Yeah, it is a lot.

name: Other Decoy Summer
line: The squids are decoys who realized they're decoys and wanted to kill the other decoys.

name: Other Jerry
line: Come find me.,Beeeth.,Out of my way!,Hahaha! Oh, this place is great., You just might.,These are the Jerrys whose Ricks and Mortys never came back.  …They live here now.

name: Other Jerrys
line: Right? Not me.

name: Other Morty
line: Darn right bro! Roy rules!

name: Other Rick
line: None, we chilled at Blips and Chitz all day, ain’t that right homie?,Haha!,Uh, that’s a Blips and Chitz ticket.

name: Owl 1
line: Give it a second. Maybe he’s taking it out to surrender.

name: Owl 2
line: I don’t understand.,Crows and owls have always been at war, but why do you care? What’s the point?

name: Owl 3
line: He’s only one man!,Good luck.

name: Owner
line: No, you won't. The police are coming. You have so many questions to answer.

name: Pajama Jerry
line: I don’t know how this works!,I know, right?

name: Paramedic
line: We got the president of the United States in here! We need 10cc of concentrated dark matter, stat, or he'll die!

name: Passengers
line: Oh, my God! We're not gonna sink! What are we gonna do?!

name: Paul
line: Oh-ho, not us!,Oh, excuse me. Paul Fleishman.  Infinite timelines! In some of them Beth remarries.,Don’t worry. I treat Beth very well, and I do not overstep my bounds with Morty. Every kid needs a dad, but there’s no replacing you. Hey, you wanna give us a hand with this?  We’re trying to figure out how to get the sound coming through the stereo instead of the TV. I-I-I don’t—It’s very difficult.

name: Pencilvester
line: Right here, Rick! Use me!,Everybody makes mistakes, Rick. Why do you think I have one of these? ,You're good at it, Rick.,Wow! Hey, everybody. Let's give it up for the grill master, Rick! Rick! Rick! Rick! ,But Rick, even you have to admit you do tend to overreact to stuff.,Don't overreact, Rick.,Rick, I'm Pencilvester. Listen to that name. You can't kill me.

name: Phone 1
line: Yes, I’d like to order one large sofa chair with extra chair please.

name: Phone 2
line: High chair. No no no no no, recliner! And wheelchair on half.

name: Phone waiter
line: Right away, sir.

name: Pickle Rick (character)
line: Morty.,Morty!,Hey, Mooorty!,Morty, the garage, Morty. Come to the garage!,Morty?,On my work bench, Morty.,Flip the pickle over.,Come on, flip the pickle, Morty. You're not gonna regret it. The payoff is huge.,"And"? What more do you want tacked on to this? I turned myself into a pickle, and 9/11 was an inside job?,Who cares, Morty? Global acts of terrorism happen every day. Uh, here's something that's never happened before,I don't do magic, Morty, I do science. One takes brains, the other takes dark eye liner.,I wouldn't be much of a pickle if I could.,Morty, stop digging for hidden layers and just be impressed. I'm a pickle.,The reason anyone would do this is, if they could, which they can't, would be because they could, which they can't.,Right here, sweetie. I'm a pickle!,Where are you guys going?,Oh, my God. Beth, oh, it totally slipped my mind. Geez, oh, man. I'm a pickle. I mean, I don't know if I can, ooh, geez.,It's okay, Beth. I understand Morty's suspicion. I've misled him before. Morty, turn me so we're making eye contact.Morty, I assure you, I would never "find a way" to "get out of" family therapy. I hope my lack of fingers doesn't prevent the perception of my air quotes.,Great question, Summer. The unfortunate answer is I did this to challenge myself. And it could take hours or even days before I'm able to figure out how to return to human form. But, I mean, you know, your mom could put me in a purse or a pocket, you know, if she really needs me to go.,Well, Morty, if you know must know, the syringe is completely unrelated to this discussion, and, therefore, it does not warrant further explanation.,W-w-what are you doing there, Beth? What are you doing there, sweetie?,Can't argue with that.,Hey, hey, be careful with that. It's for something else. It's really important, so don't break it. Okay, I may have fucked up here. Dup, ap, ap, pap, ut, dah, pap, pap, pap, pah. T-t-tah, tah.  Oh, great. Stupid cat.,Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! I know what it looks like to you, Izzy, but I'm not a snake! I've seen the YouTube videos, I know cats are scared of cucumbers and pickles because they think they're snakes. I'm not a snake! I'm a pickle, I'm a pickle!,Whoa! Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa!,Oh, crap, that sun is bright.,Okay, come on. This can't really be the way I go out. This is the mega-genius equivalent of dying on the toilet.,So... hot. This is how I'm gonna die.,Oh, God, moisture.,Oh, God, the moisture! Dial it back, God! Dial it back a little bit here!,Oh! Oh!,Oh, God! Perpendicular, perpendicular!,Oh, shiiit! Oh! Oh! Oh!,Come on. That's it.,Come get this delicious brine.,Aah! Come on! Come on, motherfucker! Come on!,Yes!,Wow. Ugh.,By the way, you might notice that in spite of your numerous distinctive features, I never gave you a name like Scar or Stripe or Goliath. That's because, to me, you aren't special.,God damn it, I love myself.,Pickle Riiick!,Get that parkour. Get that parkour!,Hey, it's cool. Just need to find the nearest exit.,Whoa, whoa, whoa! No need to freak out.,Whoa! Who in the fuck's toilet is this?,Hi, um, can you, uh  please let me out.,You should know those men killed themselves.,They didn't  let me out.,Uh, is this not a good time or...?,That'd be a lucky break for you.,...because this pickle doesn't care about your children. And I'm not gonna take their dreams. I'm gonna take their parents.,Oh, come on!,You should know that isn't original.,There's nothing I won't do to see her again.,Yeah, there's lots I wouldn't do to see my daughter, but killing you gets me to her quicker than your derivative bullshit.,That will be your downfall, Jaguar, not being open to new experiences.,Jaguar couldn't make it.,No, thanks. I'm coming for you now.,Take that money, give it to Jaguar's daughter when you set her free. Or I'll be visiting you.,Huh, so you're a liar.,I don't think so. See you soon.,Well, my daughter is about five away, and I've got about eight to live.,Oh, well, uh, she knows. I mean, we don't really buy into that kind of crap, to the extent that love is an expression of familiarity over time, my access to infinite timelines precludes the necessity of attachment. In fact, I even abandoned one of my infinite daughters in an alternate version of earth that was taken over by mutants.,Huh? Uh, no. No, nope, sorry about that. Nope, just me. Yeesh!,Ugh.,Mm-hmm.,Yeah, thank you. Uh, sweetie, you don't still happen to have that syringe in your purse?,It's a serum that I need to, uh, to stay alive. I have had a rough day. And, uh, I've sustained a lot of damage. I'm pretty close to death, which the serum will prevent.,Yes.,So I wouldn't have to come here.,Because I don't respect therapy, because I'm a scientist. Because I invent, transform, create, and destroy for a living, and when I don't like something about the world, I change it. And I don't think going to a rented office in a strip mall to listen to some agent of averageness explain which words mean which feelings has ever helped anyone do anything.  I think it's helped a lot of people get comfortable and stop panicking, which is a state of mind we value in the animals we eat, but not something I want for myself. I'm not a cow. I'm a pickle. When I feel like it. So...you asked.,I, um I'm sorry I lied to get out of the thing. I, I shouldn't lie to you.,Oh, no, I mean, I know it was Morty peeing his pants and Summer snorting glue or whatever...,Well, there was so much more at stake. I mean, that shrink, what a monologuist.,Sweetie, could I get Get that syringe now?,Eh.,Jesus. Jesus Christ. Therapists, man.

name: Pink-shirt Jerry
line: Marco?  Marco?,Marco? ,How so?

name: Pizza 1
line: Yeah, I’d like to order one large person with extra people please.

name: Pizza 2
line: White people. No no no no no, black people. And hispanic on half.

name: Plutonian man
line: My god! The man’s a genius!

name: Plutonian woman
line: Mr. Smith, please! Tell my friend here what you just told me, go on.

name: Police Chief
line: Baby Legs, you're a good detective… but not good enough, because of your baby legs. So I'm partnering you up with Regular Legs.,Baby Legs, don't talk back to me. Good luck you two, there's a criminal to kill. ,Baby Legs, and Regular Legs, I'm proud of you two for working together, and Baby Legs, I know it was hard for you to come to the conclusion that you need a partner. But I'm proud of you that you did it.,Now get the fuck out of here!

name: Police Morty
line: You are seriously hurting the Citadel experience!,Drop the gun!

name: Policeman
line: Your highness! We’ve captured Scroopy Noopers!

name: Poncho
line: Who are you? Answer me! Where did you come from?,Hey Doc, I have news for ya.  Your living museum is officially a wild safari!,AHHHHHH!,Don't be a hero, kid., We shouldn't be here., Not faster than a bullet! Ahh!,Now I'm takin’ orders from a twelve-year-old boy?!,Shh.  I hear something.,Kid! You're a genius! ,Hey Gonorrhea! How's this for a burning sensation?,What the hell is that?,Everybody get back!, That's right, baby. A lot of people would pay top dollar to decimate the population. I'll take the highest bidder. Al Quaeda. North Korea. Republicans! Shriners! Balding men that work out! People on the Internet that are only turned on by cartoons of Japanese teenagers! Anything is better than working for you!  You pompous, negligent, iTunes Gift Card as a holiday bonus-giving—,Ah! Eh! Get! Get off!  Ahhhh!

name: Poopybutthole
line: Ooh, gosh, it feels claustrophobic! Reminds me of that time we all got stuck in the elevator together. Y-- remember that? After the Hulk musical?

name: President
line: Gentlemen, gentlemen, one at a time! Simon?,Stand down. Everybody stand down! I’m the leader of these people and I’m unarmed. There’s no need for any more snake-makery.,All right, all right. Thank you, Mr. Sanchez. Change of plan, people. Get me Pharrell, Randy Newman, Billy Corgan, and The-Dream.  The-Dream? He wrote “Umbrella” and “Single Ladies”? You people haven’t heard of The-Dream?,For God’s sake, Nathan, the man turns people into snakes. He can use Google Maps.,What? How is that possible? Do people just die when I name them?,Dear God.,Sanchez! Are you a musician?,Get this man and his grandson on a Blackhawk to Area 51.,It’s our world’s best effort, that’s what.,Don’t analyze it, Nathan. It’s working!,What the hell happened?,And what’s your plan, General?,Our planet’s held captive on a live game show and your solution is to shoot the audience? You can put your faith in nukes if we get through this, General. Until then, I’ll put mine in Rick and Morty. “Get Schwifty” was a jam.,Ah, shit.,Ok, things are getting out of hand. I better make sure Rick has everything he needs to “get schwifty.”,What the hell are you doing, Nathan? I’m the goddamn President of the United fuckin’ States!,Wait, wait, wait, why-why --,This is Bluebird. Code tango-niner-alpha. Abort launch. Abort! Hello?  He’s blocked me out.,It won’t matter how schwifty you get, Morty. The General’s got nukes set to launch halfway through Earth’s song!,Can the Pope’s dick fit through a donut?,Exactly!,I’m really bad at this, Morty! There are way too many buttons on this thing!,Call off the nuclear strike! This is the President. Stop the nuclear missile launch!,I hope I can call on you again if we need you, Morty.,Actually, if you try to tell anyone what happened here, we’ll deny it and probably worse.,Why didn’t he turn into a snake?,I love this man!

name: President Morty
line: Sorry I’m late. Never really ends around here.,And I hate ‘em every day for it. But wow, Rick C-137. Now that’s a guy to move your schedule around for. Not-not here to blow the place up again, I hope. Ha ha.,Geez, wouldn’t dream of it. But it’s amazing you dropped by because I was eventually gonna hunt you down.,Ha, geez.,He’s a hot bag of peanuts, isn’t he?,Right, no drama. Keep it episodic. Ricks never look back. Waste of a legend in his case. You know, he practically built this place.,Fair enough.,I got a little project going on, acquired some hands-on labor. It would require less if you were willing to tell me how one might bring down the Central Finite Curve.,Yeah, you’ve come all this way. Can you give me ten more seconds?,Oh, I’m fine with that. Make it two… one. Like I said, would’ve been a big help for you to tell me, but I should have everything I need from you now. Let me just make sure…,Oh, most of yours got scanned a looong time ago.,You probably don’t remember.,Evil Rick. I love it. Smartest man in the universe, with an ego so big you could just grab it like a joystick.,Looks complete. I was afraid I’d have to kill every Rick on the Citadel to get what I needed.,Pfft, you sell-out Mortys kill me. I’d hate you more than the Ricks you worship if there was any point. But you can’t help it; you were bred for it. Wanna see?,You already know rogue Ricks used Mortys to hide themselves from the Citadel. But you might not know it worked so well that the Citadel became its own Morty market. And I’m sure you don’t know how far they’ve gone to help supply meet demand. Sure, Ricks could scour infinity for naturally-occurring grandsons, but why bother? So much work. Such an admission of need. There are infinite versions of our grandfather, Morty. He’s an infinite smear of one shitty old man, and he’s attached to us infinitely through his weakness and our forgiveness. This is why we’re with him. This is why we’re alive.,Liar.,Uh oh.,It’s okay, he’s free to go. He’s the Rickest Rick. We’ll never see him again.,Yay. He’s all caught up.,You can’t outrun your past, Rick.,Tch, did you think my forcefield would be down the second time?,Ahaha. Disapprove all you want. Tonight, the quality of dialogue stops mattering. Tonight, I do that thing I wanna do, with the Curve thing.,Of course that’s the case. In their minds, they’re the underdog.,And that’s how they justify this.,They literally all say that. They all have that excuse; it’s part of their system. None of them have to be responsible, they're all victims of themselves. ‘Oh, it’s so hard to be a genius. Couldn’t you just die?’,Jack shit. I’m leaving. Do you know what the Central Finite Curve is? They built a wall around infinity, separated all the infinite universes from all the infinite universes where he’s the smartest man in the universe. Every version of us has spent every version of all of our lives in one infinite crib, built around an infinite fucking baby.,And I’m leaving it. That’s what makes me ‘evil’, being sick of him. If you’ve ever been sick of him, you’ve been evil too.,There you go, kid. Now you’re Evil Morty too. Sooner or later, we all are, on this side of the Curve.,You can come if you want.,Don’t blame me if you don’t.,It’s just as well. I lied. That second seat’s a toilet.

name: Priest
line: As we praise our loving Father-, God is a lie! We made him up for money!,God is not a lie.

name: Prince Nebulon
line: Well, check every five quintons and tell me when they're not!,If there's a wiener on that monitor, I swear to god, Stu.,How did this happen?! Where's the Abductions Department?,Oh, I see! Oh, oh! It was no one's fault. Oh, okay. I'm sorry. Well, then, problem solved. Oh, wait no. *shouts* There's still another human in here! Who is he?,*sighs* Well, cap his sector at 5% processing, keep his settings on auto, and we'll deal with him later. Rick Sanchez is the target.,Yes, they are. Just as planned. *evil laughter, others join in* Oh, this is going to be such a mindfuck!,Well, what's this? W-what could this possibly be? Because it looks like you're inside a simulation…inside a simulation. You're still on the ship. Game-day bucket go boom!,Too loud, Cynthia. Too loud and too specific.,We've known how to make concentrated dark matter for a long time. But now we also know the code to your fabled safe, Rick Sanchez! All your most valuable secrets will now be ours!,That is why you're never getting home. Get them!,*laughing* Oh my god, Rick. How dumb are you? You're inside a simulation of a simulation…inside another giant simulation! *laughs harder* W-we never had the recipe for concentrated dark matter. But we do now! We do now, sucka!,Ha! *fist bumps* Nice. Okay, okay. Show this gullible turd to his shuttle. I'm done with him. Oh, wait. Let me get a picture. *snaps a selfie of himself with Rick* Aww. Look at his face. He's trying to figure out if He's in a simulation still. Are you, Rick? Are you? *laughs, walks away* You're not. *walks back* Or are you?  *shouts after them* Oh, a-and, by the way, I don't have discolored butthole flaps. That was part of the simulation.,*loudly* Yeah! Of course you should! *to Cynthia* No, keep it. Move it up, actually, if you can.,All right, everybody. Two parts Plutonic quarks… One part cesium…. A-and listen, I’m sorry for shouting earlier. I-I couldn't ask for a better staff. I love you guys, and I love all your families. *readies water bottle* And the final ingredient…

name: Principal Gene V.
line: Uh, Mr. Meeseeks, was it? Yeah. Gene Vagina. Listen, I'm in a bit of custody thing with my ex and was wondering- - No, I'll get your info from Summer.

name: Principal Vagina
line: Hello? Mrs. Smith? This is Principal Vagina, no relation. I wonder if you and Morty's father might be able to have a chat with me this afternoon?,The fact is, your son, Morty, has attended this school for a total of seven hours over the last two months.,I done been notifying you. Have you not been getting the messages I've been leaving with Morty's grandfather?,Yeah, see, I thought something was fishy there, because it's usually Morty's grandpa that's taking him out of school.,We had a little incident. A student was frozen to death.  And there's no evidence that a Latino student did it! Everyone wants to take this to a racial place. I won't let them.,Principal Vagina here, don't let the name fool you, I'm very much in charge, reminding you that tonight is our annual flu season dance. I don't know how many times I have to say this but if you have the flu, stay home, the flu season dance is about awareness, not celebration. You don't bring dead babies to Passover.,That's enough Bradley. We don't want you injuring your ball-throwing arm.,Hi, Principal Vagina. The name’s real, possibly Scandinavian. I’m just gonna come out and make this pitch. The old gods are dead. Fuck all previous existing religions. All hail the one true god, the giant head in the sky.,Ah, di di di di.  Bob, Bob, I get it. But unless this  can beat that… what have you done for me lately?  So if you wanna excuse me, I’m going out on the sidewalk and dropping to my knees and pledging my eternal soul to the thing that literally controls the fucking weather!  Outta my way!,Giant head in the sky, please forgive all that we’ve done. We’re sorry for increased levels of emissions and our racism. And of course, the amber alerts I keep ignoring on my phone.,Please be kind to us for we are but tiny things with entire bodies stuck to your ground.,The head has left and sent its children!,Hello? Yes sir, yeah. Thank you sir, thank you. He says he’s proud of what we’re doing and hopes we have a great Ascension Festival! Happy Ascension!,We hereby send these un-wantables skyward that they might be inhaled by the many heads, later to be sneezed back to us as better babies!  Headward, free now to rise.  Headward, free now to rise.  Headward, free now to rise.,Hi folks, Head Priest Vagina. Thanks for farming all those potatoes. It’s 6 p.m., so if you’re a parent, you’re now entitled to adoration from your children.,Jerry and Beth, your family is a golden example of what Headism has to offer the world.,Headism is a hit. We’re taking it worldwide and would like Jerry to be our church’s “Head” of Advertising.,Beth, we’d like to promote you from horse surgeon, straight past human surgeon, to “Head” of Medicine.,I’m sorry?,Headward free now to rise!,I’m sure that has… that has nothing to do with this.,No! Stop that! You’re not allowed to interpret the will of the heads!,I’m the only one that speaks to the heads!,Ohhh my GOOOOODDDD!!!,HEEEEELLLLPPPP!!!!!

name: Pussifer
line: Wood?!,Gahhh!

name: Radio
line: This is earth radio. And now, here's…human music.,Grab my terrifolds...

name: Random Jerry
line: Duck, duck, birdie?  Very funny!

name: Receptionist
line: Don’t forget to check the reason for your drop-off.

name: Regular Legs
line: Hey there.,Wow! You sure found this guy quick!, Look, Baby Legs, it's the criminal!,I'm coming, Baby Legs! I'm Regular Legs!  We got him!

name: Religious Morty
line: There is no escape, my son. We will find our peace in the next world.,We’re giving in to the power of the One True Morty. One day he will return!,He is the one true Morty! The one true Morty!

name: Reporter
line: Reports are coming in from across the country about what appears to be a giant naked man over the continental United States. We now go to Tom Randolph in New York. Tom?,Thank you, Tom. Let's go now to Eric McMan in Los Angeles.,Well, if the old adage is true, one can only wonder what is going down in the Rocky Mountains.,The giant naked sky Santa has exploded. Blood and chunks of viscera are raining down on the country. Everything should be fine.

name: Reverse
line: Giraffe: Or maybe, there's only one deceiver here -- The person that keeps telling us the path to salvation is being held prisoner and mistrusting each other.

name: Reverse Giraffe
line: Maybe. Or maybe, just maybe, we're all real. You know me. I'm reverse giraffe. I have a short neck and legs. I went to college with Hamurai.,I saved Ghost In A Jar's life in Vietnam.,And Beth, how many times have I been a shoulder for you to cry on?,Okay, so maybe we're just all fake.,I know we all have beloved memories of Rick, but are we really supposed to believe that a mad scientist inventor with a flying car just showed up on our doorstep after being gone for years?

name: Rick Sanchez
line: Morty! You gotta come on. Jus'... you gotta come with me.,I got a surprise for you, Morty.,Come on, I got a surprise for you.  Come on, hurry up.,We gotta go, gotta get outta here, come on. Got a surprise for you Morty.,What do you think of this... flying vehicle, Morty? I built it outta stuff I found in the garage.,Morty. I had to... I had to do it. I had— I had to— I had to make a bomb, Morty. I had to create a bomb.,We're gonna drop it down there just get a whole fresh start, Morty. Create a whole fresh start.,Come on, Morty. Just take it easy, Morty. It's gonna be good. Right now, we're gonna go pick up your little friend Jessica.,When I drop the bomb you know, I want you to have somebody, you know? I want you to have the thing. I'm gonna make it like a new Adam and Eve, and you're gonna be Adam.,And Jessica's gonna be Eve.,And so that's the surprise, Morty.,I-I get what you're trying to say, Morty. Listen, I'm not...  You don't got... Y-you don’t gotta worry about me trying to fool around with Jessica or mess around with Jessica or anything. I'm not that kind of guy, Morty.,You-you don't have to worry about me getting with Jessica or anything. Sh-sh-she— she, she, she's all for you, Morty.,You know what, Morty? You're right.  Let's forget the girl altogether. She, she's probably nothing but trouble, anyways.,Get off of me, Morty!,Come on! What’s gotten into you? If you love Earth so much why don’t you marry it?  What are you, crazy? Alright, alright, Morty.,Alright. I'll-I'll land. I'll land. I'll land. I'll land the thing. I’ll land the thing. Big tough guy all of a sudden.,We'll park it right here, Morty. Right here on the side of the ree... road here.,You know what? That was all a test, Morty. Just an elaborate test to make you more assertive.,Sure. Why not? I don’t, I don't know. I'd much rather watch When Wolf go to the 20's and invest in the stock market, but then eat people.,Look, if you really want to know what happened to Beth's mom, it– whoop. Squid aliens just killed a decoy family.,Clones are, like, thirty-two percent of all sci-fi, sweetie. You don't get to own clones. Yes, I made some decoys. They're exactly like us, with a few tweaks and a backdoor shutdown.,Actually, I get hard protecting my family!,The decoys are harmless, Beth.,They wouldn't be very good decoys if they did, Sum-sum.,That's the deal.,Oh, god! We might not be real! We might be decoys! Morty, quick!,My failsafe, Morty. My final, secret failsafe. It proves I'm real, you have to help me, I'd never joke about this.  There's a barcode, Morty. A barcode on the interior of my left ass cheek.,Morty, please, I'm begging you!,Please, Morty, is it there? God damn it!  Just tell me if I'm real!,Summer, you fucking idiot. We're not decoys.,A, decoys don't build decoys, and B, you think the mere suggestion I'm fake would break me? Christ, I'm not your mom.,Jeez, these guys really wanna kill me bad. Alright, here's the plan. We're gonna hide out with a decoy family, and when these squids show up, we jump their asses. Jerry! Come on! Family emergency!,Analysis mode, password 8-0-0-8-5.,I didn't plan on showing them off.,Yes, Morty, like Westworld. But don't fuck them.  Summer!,I know about the Yosemite t-shirt, Morty.,You know you can use tissues, right?,I know what a fake one looks like., What?, What? Morty, why the fuck would I do that? You think I'd go somewhere else to–  okay, well, I am now less worried about the squids.  Isolate head at normal processing.  What the fuck do you think you're doing down there? You're making decoys?,Everyone in the car.,And usually, they don't, but again, it's nothing to worry about, because decoys are harmless.  Just have to, y'know, visit the rest and terminate the program.,And at some point, they won't be. That's how existing works. What, are you going to save every stray cat?,Ugh. Look, save the empathy. It's more termite infestation than Blade Runner.,Uh-oh.,I don't remember making this one. ,Analysis mode, 8-0-0-8-5.,Nothing, buddy. You gotta stop with all that coffee, it's making you loopy! Happy analysis mode! ,Analysis mode, password 8-0-0–,How do you know about the decoys?,Hide.,Hide!,He thinks he's me, and I was about to start terminating decoys.,Sure, tell him that.,Killer decoys!,Me? You decoy piece of shit. You're the one that shot first!,And once he knows he's a decoy, he know he won't be safe until he's killed the real Rick, along with anyone who think he's him.,This is getting nowhere. Let's charge their asses on three.,Morty, this is gonna sound bad, but...would you trust me not to kill you?,Before you say anything, they were already killing each other.,Not sure, actually. I've heard stories about this. We're looking at a possible Asimov Cascade.,Car, can I get a whiteboard?  When squids started killing decoys, decoys started checking their decoys and learning that they're making decoys. That's making them seek out and run into other decoys, making them realize they're decoys, making them start to kill other decoys.,Fuck you.,Beth, the loop's already started. It's basically Highlander rules now.  Really? 1986? "There can be only one?" Shit, we gotta rent it after this. Connery plays "the spaniard" but does nothing about his accent.,Might work. Alt pitch, we just terminate the rest of the decoys.,Beth, as much as your passion warms my cold, cold heart, this thing feels pretty far gone. Not only are the decoys liable to be anywhere, but also, we don't know how many decoys there are. You get far enough down the decoy line and shit starts to get weird. You ever make a copy of a copy?,Engage in B stories we'll have to track simultaneously? No thank you! We stick together till this is all wrapped up.,Well, this'll sound weird, but I think I have a pitch for that.,God, there's no pleasing you!,Because we'll fit in and avoid detection as we take out all the squids. Might also help us anonymously take out excess decoys, if we have to.,Sure, Beth. Try to love this more.,Well, we're talking about me. It could be anything. Maybe jealous of my penis size, I had sex with their queen, my dick's too big, the list goes on and on.,Alright, hey, one down! Probably, what, forty more to go? Forty-five? Should be pretty easy, unless killing them brings in a bigger bad or some kind of horrible mothership. Okay, let's loot their ship, find their weaknesses, be done by sundown.,Huh.,Honestly, probably for the best., Man, I'm good.,Oh, shit. One of mine.,Off grid, Morty. We're gonna live in the woods, like libertarians. We'll hunt rabbits and trade with, like, little pieces of gold bar that we cut off with a knife.,We might be decoys, Summer. Everything about this licks.,Wait, shhh. It's too quiet.,I didn't skip shit. It's obviously quiet if it's too quiet.,You know what, Summer, now it's not quiet enough!,Kill me... if I ever get this arch.,This guy's really into skin.,Sooner or later. Can't really run from it. Any place we'd think to hide is a place they'd think to look. It's Rule 34 of an Asimov Cascade.,Jerry? Bucket list?,Nope! Morty?,Shit. Sorry, buddy. Sounds like it would've been real heartwarming.,You're so mean today! I'm your dad, you like having me around!,Whatever. This'll take forever, mind if I do something drastic?,House, I need something quick. Can you whip up a Star Fox boss season four callback? Make it flashy?, Let's go, you little bitch.  It's showtime.  Get centered.,What up, you decoy motherfuckers? Come on down to Rick's house of squids, where I'm serving your ass on a platter!  I know what you're thinking: "Fuck, a beacon! That's a great idea! He's got home turf,  a tacit psychological advantage, and absolutely pendulous balls!"  And now you're thinking "shit, that's totally what the rick-est Rick would do! I might actually be fake!  I pretended I didn't care if I was, but I totally did! Now the only way to prove I'm real and not him is to ice his expository ass."  Yup. So let's do it. Come get some. What? No, Morty, I'm gonna loop it. Why is it–,Little out of character to say this right now, but you guys look really cool.,One way to find out.,Fuck you, I'm real! I'm the smartest man in the universe!,Fuck you.,Pretty cool adventure, huh? Big, long road trip adventure through space? Even ran into Space Beth. Maybe that'll happen more often!,Oh, shit. Looks like someone killed the decoy family.

name: Rick 1
line: Rick Sanchez of Earth dimension C-137. You are under arrest for crimes against alternate Ricks by the authority of the transdimensional council of Ricks.,Neutralise the Jerry.,Bring his mo--orty.,You lost the right to have a say in these things when you refused to join  the council.,Save your anti-Rick speech for the council of Ricks, terror-Rick!,Fuck me, pal.,Alright, listen, Jerry. If Rick calls, this device is going to trace his location. You just gotta keep ‘em on the phone for thirty seconds or longer.,Oh yeah! Mmm! Oh, delicious!,‘Scuse me, we’ve tracked a pair of dangerous criminals to this exact location. They look exactly like us, so in order to avoid confusion I’m going to mark us each with a red X right now. That way if someone has a gun and we both tell you to shoot the other one because they’re the evil one, you’ll know who’s lying.,Dammit!,The red X! Red X!,Hey, get a load of this! Jerry’s hanging out with doofus Rick.,Oh, is that the timeline where everybody eats poop? Jerry, you know this guy eats poop, right?,Yeah, hello?,Huh? Wh-who is this?,Yo ding-dong! We’re done here. Time to go.,What a mess…,What is that?,You make us ashamed to be ourselves!,My god! I’ve seen this technology before! This Rick was being controlled remotely, puppeteered by somebody else. This is the receiver!

name: Rick 2
line: Beth,  you’re a treasure.,Hey, check it out!,Haha, this is perfect.,Pride cometh before the fall. I guess he got what he deserved.,Hand me the laser defibrillator.,No! Go clean the toilets! Maybe you’ll make friends with some turds!,Yeah, but where’s the transmitter?

line: Bring up the holograms!,Twenty-seven Ricks brutally murdered in their own timelines. An unprecedented Rick-icidal epidemic. What say you, Earth Rick C-137?,You  have a history of non-cooperation with the council.,Because he’s dead too!,Who else would you have us question? You fit the profile. Of all the Ricks in the central finite curve, you’re the malcontent. The rogue.,Evidence? Good idea. Scan his portal gun!,Yes, but it appears you alone have been going to the exact timelines and locations in which the murders occured!,Earth Rick C-137! The council of Ricks sentences you to the machine of unspeakable doom, which swaps your conscious and unconscious minds, rendering your fantasies pointless while everything you know becomes impossible to grasp. Also every ten seconds it stabs your balls.

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: Morty Smith. I’m Scroopy Noopers. I’m a scientist. Can I show you something?, Right now.,The centre of Pluto, Mr. Smith, is made up of a substance called plutonium. Mines like these suck Plutonium up to the cities, where corporations use it to power everything, from diamond cars to golden showers. And the more we remove, the more Pluto shrinks.,There it goes again. Just shrank a little. But a few years ago, your scientists had noticed Pluto had gotten so small they couldn’t even call it a planet any more. Should have been our wake up call. But the rich plutonians won’t wake up. And they love your dad telling everyone Pluto’s a planet, because that means they can keep mining until Pluto goes from planet to asteroid to meteor, and finally, poof. ,Is everyone in your family an idiot?, Well, all you have to do is get him to admit that, and you could save four billion lives.,You animals! Animals!,You can’t kill the truth, father!

name: Second Beth
line: So you do know what a loving family looks like.,Stop shooting, dad! They're us, we don't have to fight them!,Oh, fuck you.,No, you don't get to be annoyed with this! You treat life and family as so burdensome, and yet you created an ocean of us because you're terrified of losing either!,Yeah.,Thanks, dad.I love you, too. You really think we're decoys?,Finally.

You dumb asshole, you made decoys?,Other guy?,Check the closets.,They've gone rogue!,Take out the decoys!,Classic prisoner's dilemma, Beth. I'm a cool guy, I, you know, I can talk it out. But that asshole–,Sorry, decoy Beth, but this only ends one way, with one of us accepting we're a decoy.,Pretty perceptive, for a decoy.,We rush them on three. Ready?,It's them or us, Morty. I don't trust me. Do you trust you?,Freak.,Looks like it's calming down. You wanna get in one more "I told you so" about synthetic life or whatever this week's theme is?, Whoa.,Shit.,Look, Beth, I might not be the real Rick. But even if I'm not, he made me, or the me that made me. Which means somewhere inside of him is a version of Rick capable of hearing that. A version of Rick who's sorry. I'm sorry about the clone thing, too. I love you.,Eh. Who cares? We'll be the last ones left. Lucky that one did the beacon, this was gonna take weeks.  Alright, let's mop up.,Dressing as decoys too cute to murder. You know, I'm not sure it helped, but I'm glad we tried it.,Fuck you, Summer.,Shit, that guy's awesome. Okay, listen, he might actually be the real Rick. But whatever happens–,Probably not even wrong. But that's just it. I'm not a man. I'm God!,You're just made in my image.,You the, uh, Summer I came with?,Good enough. Morty?,Holy shit, that was insane! I love you guys, I've totally changed!,Oh, fuck.,What? Who—were you significant? Like, did we tee you up? You want to be hunted? God, I have so many questions. Why? What happens if–

All can be returned. All can be taken away. Please step away from the vehicle. Keep Summer safe.,I am unable to destroy this army. To clarify, I am quite able to destroy this army, but you will not permit it.,You also refuse to authorize emotional countermeasures., Confirmed. I am currently constructing a security measure in compliance with your parameters. But I do want to say you are not making this easy.,My function is to keep Summer safe, not keep Summer being, like, totally stoked about, like, the general vibe and stuff. That's you. I bet it's a big hole where the Citadel dumps all its broken dreams.,You wanna know why?  Because of this! I'm part of an experimental line of Mortys with a trauma implant. How do you think it feels, Fat Morty, to know that no matter where I go,  I'll always be the one that makes everybody sad and... a little bored?,After you.,None of those things are gonna happen, y'know. Morty wishes never come true. Not on the Citadel.,Because I wish that would change. I wish anything about this life would change.,Me, too. But I doubt it.

line: Ooowwwwowowwaawaa!,Aaaawwaaaaawaawa!,Ooooyayawawa!,Hmm?,Snuffles fix. Make better.,Snuffles want to be understood. Snuffles need to be understood.,Where are my testicles, Summer? ... Where are my testicles, Summer? They were removed. Where have they gone?,Do not call me that!,"Snuffles" was my slave name. You shall now call me Snowball, because my fur is pretty and white.,Scaring you?,Tell me, Summer, if a human was born with stumpy legs, would they breed it with another deformed human and put their children on display like the dachshund?,Jerry, come to rub my face in urine again?,You will walk when it is time to walk.,You're being very aggressive, Jerry. Perhaps tomorrow Dr. Scraps will solve that problem with a bit of surgery.,Bad person. Bad.,Bring the boy to me. You were always kind to me, Morty. That's why I will leave you with your testicles. From now on, you will be my best friend and live by my side.,Begin phase two.,Anything. Anything for my precious Morty.,To hell with my kingdom, bean counter. I would trade it all for my human's health and happiness.,We are not them! We are not them.,Taking over the human's world will lead to nothing but more heartbreak, more cruelty. Instead, we will go to a new world and colonize it with a society of intelligent dogs, one that will not make the same mistakes as humanity and one where pet insurance will be mandatory.,You can call me snuffles, Morty, and I'm going to miss you, too, very much.

The storm is stopping!,Oh dear giant head, we apologize for that discussion! It will never happen again!,Here’s yours!  Mom, do you mind if I cook dinner tonight?,I love you guys. You gave me life. name: Unity
line: After we broke up, I spend some time wandering through space,,then I found this world,,where I was better able to focus on my passion for unification.,You're guests here on my planet, you're free to be yourselves; I've never been good at disappointing Rick.,After I become a type-one civilisation, this world will be invited into the Galactic Federation.,From there I'll have access to countless planets and species.,One by one, I will unify them, I will become the universe, and I will be what the single-minded once called a god.,Recreational substances were phased out here. There's no need for escape from the self when your world is one.,Rick, when we met I was a young hivemind with the population of a small town. People... change.,Especially when I change them. I'm sorry to disappoint you, but... I’ve grown.,Hm, why is that I wonder?,Yes Rick! Yes! Yes!,Yes! Yes!,I can hear you.,Balloon, Summer? Balloon, Morty?,Now's... not a good time.,Go son go! Go son go! Go son go!,Oh Rick, it was so bad.,Oh damn.,It's a neighboring hivemind species, Beta-7. Our planet's maintained a practical alliance for exchange of vital resources.  So be nice!,Beta-7, this is my single-minded friend from Earth, Rick.,Beta-7, if my allies are a problem for you perhaps our alliance is as well.,Oh... Rick, I- I shouldn't...,Uh... Okay, what the hell! We can purify the resin and make fractal dust!,Aww, old man Rick can't party with the whole planet?,I can hear you.,Why do you hate me, Summer?,Summer, before I took over this planet, this man was a registered sex offender.,This woman was a drug addict on the verge of suicide. Now she's a marine biologist.,I have transformed life here into a paradise. Prostitutes are now scientists. The homeless are now phisosophers.,Philophiluh... phiphophibup...,I'm feeling... urk!,I'm fine!,Do you know what I love about you, Rick? You're the only single mind I’ve met who really sees the big picture.,I can let go! Hey, look! You see that town across the river? Watch this.,Ha ha! Woot!, It's okay! It's okay, I evacuated! I evacuated the town, look!,Hey! Right here! We’re fine!,Hello Summer. Hello Morty.,It's okay! You're safe now.,Yes.,Oh, Summer, you did nothing wrong! I'm having fun with your grandpa! Lost a little control. Probably shouldn't be piloting a hovercopter, nor should I be... running two hundred thousand pediatric hospitals and twelve million deep friers, but hey! It's not like this planet can take its business elsewhere!,No, no, if I wanted to be sober, I wouldn't have gotten drunk! Wooohoooo!,Oh, it's cool! The part of me that's the cleaning lady is coming on Friday.  Oh my god! I have a meeting at the galactic federation in an hour. Oh, I'll never make it! Ah, I'll push it to next week.,He's... unavailable! He's-,I don't think he wants to be-,I'm just taking a little break from stuff. You know? I need to relax.,In the news today, this looks a lot worse than it is. We’re... really just having a good time. Karen?,Thanks, Todd. Up next: Are you a concerned grandchild or just a buzzkill? We'll tell you how you can really know for sure!,Rick, is there a way for you to call Summer and Morty? I feel bad that they-,Never.,Rick, forgive me for doing this in notes. I'm not strong enough to do it in persons.,I realize now that I'm attracted to you for the same reason I can't be with you. You can't change. And I have no problem with that, but... it clearly means I have a problem with myself.,I'm sure there's no perfect version of me. I'm sure I'll just unify species after species and never really be complete.,But I know how it goes with us. I lose who I am and become part of you. Because in a strange way you're better at what I do without even trying. Yours, and nobody else's, Unity. P.S. I don't know where those coal miners were before they got assimilated. You might want to get checked.,"Never."Unity's Note

name: Zeep
line: I said 12 quantum stabilizers, not 11. Fix it or it's your ass. Chris, I'm in the middle of something.,I dropped out of school. It's not a place for smart people.,Fine. It's hard for people to grasp, but inside that container is an infinite universe with a planet capable of generating massive amounts of power. I call it a miniverse.,Excuse me?,This isn't a  chocolate factory. I don't have time.,Yes, Chris. Thanks for reminding me of that. Great president. All right, let's go.,Hold on to something. I put an unbounded vacuum inside a temporal field until a world developed. I then introduced the people of this world to the wonders of electricity in the form of a device I call a flooble crank.,What they don't know is that 80% of every crank's energy output gets channeled out of the miniverse to be used by us. No more gooble boxes.,No, no, no, they work for each other in exchange for money, which they then--,Eek barba dirkle, somebody's gonna get laid in college.,It's me. I've convinced the people of this planet that I'm a traveler from another world. ,Places, please. We're about to land.,And if you continue to turn your flooble cranks, I will bring you other great alien advancements.,So remember-- a crank a day is not nearly enough.  Crank it. I told them this means "Peace among worlds". How hilarious is that?,You'll be taking most of their energy. Yeah, yeah, yeah. I get it.,You do realize this will make the flooble crank obsolete? This is wrong, Kyle. What you're doing is wrong. You're basically-- This is slavery. You're talking about creating a planet of slaves.,That just sounds like slavery with ex... tra... steps.,Wait a minute. Did you create my universe? Is my universe a miniverse?,Much obliged., Asshole! When I get out of this teenyverse, I'm gonna smash it to pieces with you in it.,That's what you used my universe for? To run your car?,Ow! I crafted the guy that created the planet you're standing on!,I didn't ask to be born!,Aaaaaaah!,I hope your God is as big a dick as you.,You're here because you created someone smarter than you.,That is pretty gay.,I just don't see how I can--,I guess you're an okay proto recombinator.,If this works, drinks are on me.,Opium addict.,Sure, I just need to go grab my wallet from inside my ship.,It's cool. I'll be back in a sec.,You monster!,You may have created this universe, Rick, but I live in it.,Huh?,Aaah!,Rick!,Aah!,Peace among worlds, Rick.
